TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void IncomingHandler(object o, IncomingArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed IncomingHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the IncomingHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the IncomingHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the IncomingHandler is removed from the event.
